onboarding.tazkiyahMeaning: Tazkiyah means "purification" - the process of cleansing the soul and adorning it with beautiful character. Let's start with your first spiritual goal.
onboarding.quranVerse: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا ۝ فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا ۝ قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
onboarding.quranTranslation: "And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it. And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness. He has succeeded who purifies it" (Quran 91:7-9)
